name: Esky Key Finder Locator with Sound, Stick-on TV Remote Control Finder, Item Locator Tags with 85dB Noise Sound 6 Receivers, Wallet Tracker Key Finders for Finding Keys, Remote Gift Idea
short_description: 85dB Loud Sound + LED Light : Never miss a beep! The Esky Key Finder features a powerful up to 85dB sound, loud enough to pinpoint your items even in noisy environments. The built-in LED light flashes when activated, helping you quickly locate lost keys or remote control in the dark—perfect for late-night searches or cluttered spaces.

Long Battery Life, Hassle-Free: Tired of constant battery swaps? Each receiver of our key finder locator with sound comes with a premium CR2032 coin battery that lasts up to one year. Spend less time worrying about power and more time enjoying peace of mind. Whether you're tracking car keys, TV remotes, or wallets, our long-lasting batteries ensure your key locatoer is always ready when you need it.

100ft Long-Range Tracking: Advanced RF technology lets you track items through walls, doors, and furniture up to 100ft (30m). Whether your keys are buried in the couch, hiding in the car, or lost in the office, just press the remote to activate the alarm—no frantic digging required! (Note: Obstacles like walls may slightly reduce volume, please use in open area.)

Simple, Compact & Versatile：No app or smartphone needed! Designed for all ages, this user-friendly key finder tags works with one button. At just 0.2 inches thick, it’s ultra-slim and lightweight. Attach it anywhere using 3 options: keyring (for keys, bags, pet collars), adhesive tape (for TV remotes, phones, wallets), or hook-and-loop stikers. 6 vibrant colors help you organize items effortlessly.

Great Gift Choice: Ideal for forgetful parents, scatterbrained friends, or kids who misplace toys! A thoughtful gift for birthdays, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, or Christmas—combine practicality with heartfelt care. Say goodbye to stress and wasted time! Locate keys, remotes, wallets, or luggage in seconds. Reclaim your day and enjoy a clutter-free, anxiety-free life with Esky.

Packing List & Pro Tips for Best Performance : Everything included: 6 receivers (track multiple items at once!), 1 remote, 1 base, 6 keyrings, 7 pre-installed batteries, 3 hook-and-loop stickers, and 3 adhesive pads.
